video.title: Getting started with jQuery (tutorial) - Beau teaches JavaScript
video.description:
jQuery is a very popular, lightweight JavaScript library. The purpose of jQuery is to make it much easier to use JavaScript on websites. jQuery simplifies a lot of the complicated things from JavaScript, like AJAX calls and DOM manipulation.

Learn the basic syntax in this video.

💻 Code: https://codepen.io/beaucarnes/pen/mwGZre?editors=1010

🐦 Beau Carnes on Twitter: https://twitter.com/carnesbeau

⭐JavaScript Tutorials Playlists⭐
▶JavaScript Basics: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbk2qRZtWSzCIN38JC_NdhW5
▶Data Structures and Algorithms: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbkso-IbgiiP48n-O-JQA9PJ
▶ES6: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbljtmmeS0c-CEl2LdE-eR_F
▶Clean Code: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbkK24EaPurzMq0-kw5U9pJh

-
Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on technology: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

And subscribe for new programming videos every day: https://youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=freecodecamp

topLevelComment.author: arya tamang
topLevelComment.text: can you provide graphics designing course?

topLevelComment.author: Harpreet Singh
topLevelComment.text:
Hello,

I've taken few your courses and learned a lot. I needed some advise towards my career and getting better at JavaScript. Okay, so I'm a junior freelance front-end developer & UX/UI Designer. I'm trying to get better at JavaScript and really nail the core with building projects/games/hackerrank.com exercises.

What I'm doing now is: freelance work to gain experience and pay bills, game development to get better at JavaScript logic, and enhancing my math skills also to get better at logic.

Should I not be creating games and just be completing hacker rank exercises to get better at logic?

Also, React is really big now but I'm not able to get enough work done for freelance or other tasks if I try and fit in React - plus I feel getting great at core JavaScript is important too so thats why don't want to give up logic development through games or hacker rank.

Maybe I can just build more client sites for two months and while I do I can continue to build games/hackerrank.com to improve my logic. And after two months I learn react?

Confusing for sure.

Any advise?

replies.author: Paras Jain
replies.text: Hey, you have an excellent question. It would have been better if someone advised you 5 years ago. Hope you have grown a lot. I am a junior developer and I like javascript but don't really know how to grow. The project I am currently in offers almost zero learning. Logic wise I think I am okay but would like to build more and I am a bit skeptical about React, if you have any advise, it would be very helpful. Thanks.

topLevelComment.author: Sushant Taneja
topLevelComment.text: Why jQuery script tag is included in the head ? Isn't it a best practice to add the script tags after the body tag ?

topLevelComment.author: CrashThatCode
topLevelComment.text: Learn swift. Build a group messaging chat application! Subscribe to my channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX4D0w-k2NmUBOzkbmSvV9w

topLevelComment.author: Igor Oliinyk
Garrett Sloup
topLevelComment.text: If I wanted to make an app that had jQuery in it, would it need to be online (hooked to the internet) to run all of my jQuery code? From what I understand, the jQuery CDN is used to access the library through the internet, so how would that work?

replies.author: Lucas Campos
replies.text: Yeah, you would need internet access to download the lib from a CDN, or you could just embed it in your app.

topLevelComment.author: thisguymartin
topLevelComment.text: jQuery is not lightweight at all

replies.author: Dmytro Davidenko
replies.text: Martin Patino you can customize it for your needs, if you hosting from your website (20kb gzipped, but only core). but if you using jquery from CDN, user could probably already have it cached.

topLevelComment.author: Mirza Sisic
topLevelComment.text: Amazing timing I'm learning it right now!!

replies.author: Tech Relay
replies.text: Me too :) We should buddy up and help each other out

topLevelComment.author: Hitesh Choudhary
topLevelComment.text: Good decision to get started with jquery, Beau, I like the way of 'Beau' teaches

topLevelComment.author: Gavin Michael
topLevelComment.text: Many places I hear that jQuery is not really needed as something that you need to know. Why is that?

replies.author: Susan Jones
replies.text: You don't need a lot of things that are very useful.   I want to make some interactive math lessons online and this will be a way to make things happen efficiently and easily...

replies.author: Mirza Sisic
replies.text: Bunch of sites are using it, don't mind those hating hipsters!

replies.author: MrMrwilson11
replies.text: Its good to know. Easy to learn. many people feel its beneath them to use it. Dont pay attention to that kind of talk
